library(tidyverse)
library(spData)
library(sf)
library(mapview) # new package that makes easy leaflet maps
library(foreach)
library(doParallel)


registerDoParallel(4)
getDoParWorkers() # check registered cores

library(tidycensus)
census_api_key("bf61e1f275fc62fc68c3140600f3c29ef871dad7")
install=TRUE

library(tidycensus)
racevars <- c(White = "P005003", 
              Black = "P005004", 
              Asian = "P005006", 
              Hispanic = "P004003")

options(tigris_use_cache = TRUE)
erie <- get_decennial(geography = "block", variables = racevars, 
                  state = "NY", county = "Erie County", geometry = TRUE,
                  summary_var = "P001001", cache_table=T) 
                  

Buffalo<- st_crop(erie, xmin=-78.9,xmax=-78.85,ymin=42.888,ymax=42.92)
  race = unique(Buffalo$variable)
  foreach(i=1:4, .combine=rbind)%do%
  race[i]
  
  Buff_race <- foreach(i=1:4, .combine = "rbind") %do% {
  Buffalo %>% 
    filter(variable == race[i]) %>% 
    st_sample(size = .$value) %>% 
    st_as_sf() %>% 
    mutate(variable = race[i])
}
mapview(Buff_race, 
        cex = 1, 
        alpha = 0)
